TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceIDConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 创建一个可由用户选择的数据源名称列表。

span.span: Creates a user-selectable list of data source names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是通常由特性引用的对象。 The class is a object that is typically referenced by the attribute. 方法返回的数据源名称是指定上下文的容器中的组件, 这些组件是有效的数据源。The data source names that are returned by the method are of components from the container of the specified context that are valid data sources. 方法获取一个值, 该值指示返回的数据源名称是否为可能值的独占列表。The method gets a value indicating whether the returned data source names are an exclusive list of possible values. 方法获取一个值, 该值指示数据源名称是否是可以从列表中选取的一组标准值。The method gets a value indicating whether the data source names are a standard set of values that can be picked from a list. 方法将指定的对象转换为转换器的本机类型。The method converts the specified object to the native type of the converter. 方法获取一个值, 该值指示是否可以将指定源类型的对象转换为本机类型。 The method gets a value indicating whether this can convert an object in the specified source type to the native type. 方法指示指定的组件是否实现接口。 The method indicates whether the specified component implements the interface.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当特性引用类时, .NET Framework 在内部构造类的新实例。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when the class is referenced by a attribute.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此转换器是否可以将指定源类型的对象转换为转换器的本机类型。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the specified source type to the native type of the converter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法只能从字符串进行转换, 因此, 仅当为字符串`true`时`sourcetype`才返回。 The method can only convert from a string, so the only returns `true` when `sourcetype` is a string. 不`context`使用参数。The does not use the `context` parameter.

param.span: 一个实现 的对象，该对象将有关上下文的信息提供给类型转换器，以便类型转换器可以执行转换。

span.span: An object implementing the that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.

summary.span: 返回可用数据源名称的列表。

span.span: Returns a list of the available data source names.

returns.span: 包含一些控件名称的 ，这些控件可实现 接口并可在给定上下文中使用。

span.span: A containing the names of the controls that implement the interface and are available for use in the given context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建组件名称列表, 这些组件是`context`参数所指定的对象的容器中的有效数据源。 The method creates a list of the names of the components that are valid data sources in the container of the object that is specified by the `context` parameter. 然后, 它会将该列表转换为对象。It then converts that list to a object.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示返回的数据源名称是否为可能值的排他性列表。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the returned data source names are an exclusive list of possible values.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果从类派生一个类, 并重写方法以返回数据源名称的独占列表, 还应重写当数据源名称列表`true`为独占时要返回的方法。If you derive a class from the class and override the method to return an exclusive list of data source names, also override the method to return `true` when the data source name list is exclusive. `context`参数不由使用。The `context` parameter is not used by the .

Always .

protected: virtual bool IsValidDataSource(System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ component);
abstract member IsValidDataSource : System.ComponentModel.IComponent -> bool override this.IsValidDataSource : System.ComponentModel.IComponent -> bool

param.name: component
param.span: 一个实现 接口的对象。

span.span: An object that implements the interface.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示指定组件是否是有效数据源。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified component is a valid data source.

returns.span: 如果 是有效数据源，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if is a valid data source; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果参数实现接口, 则将其视为有效`component` 的数据源。The method considers the `component` parameter to be a valid data source if it implements the interface.

para.span: 方法应由需要进一步调查给定组件的控件重写, 以确定是否应在标准值列表中返回该组件。

span.span: The method should be overridden by controls that need to further investigate a given component to decide whether it should be returned in the list of standard values.

para.span: 例如, 如果控件仅适用于数据源, 则应仅为 对象的那些组件返回。

span.span: For example, if a control works with only data sources, should return only for those components that are objects.
